title: Spectrum Noir Sparkle Fine Glitter Brush Pens Set, Perfect Pastels, Pack of 3
features: Upgrade illustrations and handmade papercrafts with the whimsical addition of these Sparkle glitter pens
Features 3 soft-hued colors including Moonstone, Cosmos, Rose Quartz
Water-soluble color with a fine glitter micro-pigment
Flexible nylon brush that creates an accurate and mess-free application
description: Give your creative projects some extra sparkle with these glitter pens. Each pen has a fine, flexible brush for accurate, mess-free application that's perfect for coloring, writing, embellishing, and more! This 2.5x8 inch package contains three glitter brush pens. Comes in a variety of colors. Each sold separately. WARNING: Choking Hazard. Not suitable for children under 3 years. Imported.
